SEARCH
Package fr.unk

Class CSPSolver<T>

java.lang.Object
fr.unk.CSPSolver<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value
public class CSPSolver<T> extends Object
Main class for the solver where you will register constraint, var and their domain and start the solve processing

    • solveDomain

      public boolean solveDomain(DomainMap<T> domainMap)
      Function will search for the domain with low amount of possibility and start the search of a valid value on it
      Parameters:
      domainMap - current domain map to search on
      Returns:
      True if a solution is found

    • trySolve

      public Map<String,T> trySolve()
      Start all of the solving process, it start the iteration of every value available for each var
      Returns:
      Map with VarName as Key and the variable value
